name: Narcoleptic Nummies
description:
Narcoleptic Nummies

Nelson is a narcoleptic with a sweet tooth, on the hunt for his cookies. Sleep hits him uncontrollably. Collect the cookies and watch out for vegetables. But beware! When he’s dreaming, the lovable nummies aren’t what they seem to be anymore...

This game was created for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam. The theme was "out of control." 

Controls

  • A + D / Left + Right Arrows - Move
  • W / Spacebar / Up Arrow - Jump

Credits:

Narcoleptic Nummies was created by Peach Beach Studios.

  • Lauren Aquino - Designer/Illustrator
  • Ryan Gerhlein - Sound/Music
  • Wendy Jia - Illustrator/Animator
  • Levi Kaplan - Programmer/Designer
  • Kimin Lee - Programmer/Designer
  • Kathryn Minor - UI Designer/Illustrator
